### checkImageHandleSymbol() {#a1eabfa08d9f5682ef10510527d49734b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool llvm::NVPTXMachineFunctionInfo::checkImageHandleSymbol (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Symbol) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> if the symbol has a mapping.

Having a mapping means the handle is replaced with a reference

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxmachinefunctioninfo-h/#l00058">58</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxmachinefunctioninfo-h">NVPTXMachineFunctionInfo.h</a>.

### clone() {#ae205e0e0ae07b83425271d046b65f15b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MachineFunctionInfo &#42; llvm::NVPTXMachineFunctionInfo::clone (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8e612822d4ba7bb36c9c79582a567108">BumpPtrAllocator</a> &amp; Allocator, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; DestMF, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; Src2DstMBB) const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Make a functionally equivalent copy of this <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinefunctioninfo">MachineFunctionInfo</a> in <code>MF</code>.

This requires remapping <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> references from the original parent to values in the new function. Targets may assume that virtual register and frame index values are preserved in the new function.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxmachinefunctioninfo-h/#l00031">31</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxmachinefunctioninfo-h">NVPTXMachineFunctionInfo.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

Returns the symbol name at the given index.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxmachinefunctioninfo-h/#l00051">51</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxmachinefunctioninfo-h">NVPTXMachineFunctionInfo.h</a>.

### getImageHandleSymbolIndex() {#a8b5ac4f54387d171bc33ed07e366becb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned llvm::NVPTXMachineFunctionInfo::getImageHandleSymbolIndex (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Symbol)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Returns the index for the symbol <code>Symbol</code>.

If the symbol was previously, added, the same index is returned. Otherwise, the symbol is added and the new index is returned.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxmachinefunctioninfo-h/#l00040">40</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxmachinefunctioninfo-h">NVPTXMachineFunctionInfo.h</a>.
